Sentencas: Modeling of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) has gained considerable significance in recent years.
Titulo: Isothermal models for anode-supported tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A detailed phenomenological model for SOFC can be used to understand performance limitations, optimization, in situ diagnostics and control.
Titulo: Isothermal models for anode-supported tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this paper, we study the transport and various electrochemical phenomena in an anode-supported tubular SOFC using a steady-state model.
Titulo: Isothermal models for anode-supported tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In particular, we discuss the importance of modeling different phenomena vis-a-vis their impact on the prediction capability of the model.
Titulo: Isothermal models for anode-supported tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is observed that even a reasonably simple model can be sufficiently predictive in a particular operating range.
Titulo: Isothermal models for anode-supported tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: As the operating range of the cell is increased, the predictive capability of a model validated in a narrow range cannot be guarantied.
Titulo: Isothermal models for anode-supported tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It has also been observed that neglecting momentum conservation in the model for a tubular SOFC can affect the predictive capability of the model at higher overpotentials.
Titulo: Isothermal models for anode-supported tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: An extensively validated model is used to study the percentage conversion of oxygen and oxygen concentration profile within a cell at different operating conditions.
Titulo: Isothermal models for anode-supported tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: All of the simulation studies are supported by experimental data that spans a wide range of operation in terms of the DC polarization, reactant flow rates and operating temperatures.
Titulo: Isothermal models for anode-supported tubular solid oxide fuel cells
